name: Transjugular Intrahepatic Portosystemic Shunt (TIPS) Thrombosis with Hepatic Encephalopathy
chief_complaint: I feel confused and my stomach is swollen and painful
prognosis: Guarded; depends on shunt patency restoration and liver function preservation. Risk of recurrent thrombosis and progressive liver failure.
description: A rare complication where a previously placed TIPS becomes thrombosed, causing portal hypertension recurrence and secondary hepatic encephalopathy due to shunting of toxins through collateral circulation. Requires urgent interventional radiology management.
multiple_choice: Transjugular Intrahepatic Portosystemic Shunt (TIPS) Thrombosis with Hepatic Encephalopathy
